Authors: Sardjono W., Wijaya C., Ciptaningsih E.M.S.S., Pujadi T.
Title: Competitive advantage strategy model in the banking industry through the implementation of the national payment gateway
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; University of Gadjahmada, Graduate Program, Master of Business Administration, Faculty of Economic and Business, Yogyakarta, Indonesia; BINUS Business School UnderGraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Sardjono, W., BINUS Graduate Program - Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wijaya, C., University of Gadjahmada, Graduate Program, Master of Business Administration, Faculty of Economic and Business, Yogyakarta, Indonesia; Ciptaningsih, E.M.S.S., BINUS Business School UnderGraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Management Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Pujadi, T., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Bank Indonesia as the Central Bank of the Republic of Indonesia has the main tasks contained in the three main pillars, where the three task areas need to be integrated with the relevant parties so that the goal of maintaining the stability of the rupiah value can be achieved effectively and efficiently. In the corridor of carrying out these tasks and building a strong sovereignty of the Indonesian economic system in the future, Bank Indonesia in 2017 has established a National Payment Gateway policy through the Board of Governors' Member Regulation no. 19/10 / PADG / 2017 dated September 20, 2017 concerning the National Payment Gateway. The implementation of NPG is part of Indonesia's nationalist development strategy, therefore Bank BCA as one of the Anchor Banks in Indonesia has a very strategic role in implementing this policy. This research will analyze the challenges faced by BCA in implementing a competitive advantage strategy in order to implement the National Payment Gateway policy. The results of this study are as follows: (1) Identifying problems in NPG implementation (2) Building NPG models and conditions for companies using the theory of Resource Based View, Value Chain, Factor Analysis and VRIO (3) Planning the company's competitive advantage strategy in implementing NPG. © 2020 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Competitive advantage; Implementation model; Management strategy; National payment gateway
Index Keywords: Information management; Banking industry; Competitive advantage; Development strategies; Economic system; Payment gateways; Resource-based view; Strategic role; Strategy modeling; Competition

Authors: Lubis Y., Nguyen P.T., Zelinskaya M.V., Shankar K., Ciptaningsih E.M.S.S.
Title: Importance of management for achieving goals of business [Importancia de la gestión para alcanzar los obje-tivos comerciales]
Affiliations: Universitas Medan Area, Indonesia; Department of Project Management, Ho Chi Minh City Open University, Viet Nam; Kuban State Agrarian University named after I.T. Trubilin, Russian Federation; Department of Computer Applications, Alagappa University, India; Universitas Bina Nusantara, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Lubis, Y., Universitas Medan Area, Indonesia; Nguyen, P.T., Department of Project Management, Ho Chi Minh City Open University, Viet Nam; Zelinskaya, M.V., Kuban State Agrarian University named after I.T. Trubilin, Russian Federation; Shankar, K., Department of Computer Applications, Alagappa University, India; Ciptaningsih, E.M.S.S., Universitas Bina Nusantara, Indonesia
Abstract: Managing any business is one of the important human activities. In current time every individuals start making social organizations to complete their aims in life. These aim must complete by managing people on work, so managing has been essential to substantiate the coordination of individual efforts. Economically the work load is increase for managers and lots of organization have larger groups, so they must have to allocate specific task for employee and manages to manage work. Hence for, social control information has become crucial inside the ways in which managers manage advanced organizations. It is a method or series of continuous and connected activities. In this paper a study of importance of management for achieving goals of business is review and explain for economic business. These paper deal with the management of business by manager in any small or big organization. These s necessary to build a proper successful business. © 2019, Universidad del Zulia. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Business Goals; Management; Role of Managers
References: Sen, R., (2014) The Business Management in Small company”, 16; Sinha, M.K., (2012) Resource Management of Corporation in Terms of reduction”, 14. , CE; Jain, S.S., (2011) Economical Process of Work management”, 12; Chue, S.B., (2015) Study of Role of Manager in Organization, , Management Event; Akhmetshin, E.M., Vasilev, V.L., Vlasova, N.I., Kazakov, A.V., Kotova, X.Y., Ilyasov, R.H., Improving Management Functions at an Enterprise: Levels of the Internal Control System (2019) Quality-Access to Success, 20 (171), pp. 39-43; Mullakhmetov, K.S., Aminova, R.M., Akhmetshin, E.M., Control in a management system in modern conditions (2014) Asian Social Science, 10 (24), pp. 237-247; Ibatova, A.Z., Kuzmenko, V.I., Klychova, G.S., Key performance indicators of management consulting (2018) Management Science Letters, 8, pp. 475-482
